thread.title_full: Red River Showdown central: Previews, analysis, rivalry and more | Dallas Morning News

title: Red River Showdown central: Previews, analysis, rivalry and more
text:
2015 AT&T Red River Showdown What: Texas vs. Oklahoma
When: 11 a.m. Saturday
Where: Cotton Bowl, Dallas
TV: ABC (WFAA-TV Ch. 8 in Dallas)
Radio: KKGM-AM 1630, KRLD-AM 1080
Line: Oklahoma -13.5

Coach: Charlie Strong, second season with Texas (0-1 against Oklahoma)

Last: Lost to TCU, 50-7, on Oct. 3

2015 Record: 4-0, 1-0 in Big 12
Last: Defeated West Virginia, 44-24, on Oct. 3
